title: New Report Details Best Practices in Innovative Healthcare Customer Marketing
content:
SOURCE Best Practices, LLC

CHAPEL HILL, N.C. 

According to research by Best Practices, LLC, there are many success factors and challenges associated with marketing innovation. Among success factors for innovations were: coordination among teams, knowledge, partnerships, and allocate resources and good customer relationship. Having a culture that rewards innovation and risk taking was one of the most important factors identified by research participants. 

The related report, identifies the organizational structures, roles, processes and mechanisms that biopharmaceutical companies have in place (or have in development) to promote and enable innovation and excellence in Customer Marketing.

This study will help marketers understand and maximize opportunities in:

This report engaged thirty-five representatives from 25 leading companies. Respondents work in commercial operations with a focus to improving innovative access to corporate products.
